error.highlight: That's not the highlighted bead. Try clicking the highlighted bead.

basic-1.title: Basic Addition: 0 + 1
basic-1.description: Start by adding your first earth bead
basic-1.actionDescription: Click the first earth bead to move it up

tooltip.explanation: Earth beads (bottom) are worth 1 each. Push them UP to activate them.

basic-2.title: Basic Addition: 1 + 1
basic-2.description: Add the second earth bead to make 2
basic-2.actionDescription: Click the second earth bead to move it up

tooltip.explanation: Continue adding earth beads one by one for numbers 2, 3, and 4

basic-3.title: Basic Addition: 2 + 1
basic-3.description: Add the third earth bead to make 3
basic-3.actionDescription: Click the third earth bead to move it up

tooltip.explanation: Continue adding earth beads one by one until you reach 4

basic-4.title: Basic Addition: 3 + 1
basic-4.description: Add the fourth earth bead to make 4
basic-4.actionDescription: Click the fourth earth bead to complete 4

tooltip.explanation: Four earth beads is the maximum - next we need a different approach

heaven-intro.title: Heaven Bead: 0 + 5
heaven-intro.description: Use the heaven bead to represent 5
heaven-intro.actionDescription: Click the heaven bead to activate it

tooltip.explanation: The single bead above the bar represents 5

heaven-plus-earth.title: Combining: 5 + 1
heaven-plus-earth.description: Add 1 to 5 by activating one earth bead
heaven-plus-earth.actionDescription: Click the first earth bead to make 6

tooltip.explanation: When you have room in the earth section, simply add directly

complement-intro.title: Five Complement: 3 + 4
complement-intro.description: Need to add 4, but only have 1 earth bead space. Use complement: 4 = 5 - 1
complement-intro.actionDescription: First add heaven bead (5), then remove 1 earth bead

tooltip.explanation: When you need to add 4 but only have 1 space, use: add 5, remove 1

multiStepInstructions: Click the heaven bead to add 5
Click the first earth bead to remove 1

complement-2.title: Five Complement: 2 + 3
complement-2.description: Add 3 to make 5 by using complement: 3 = 5 - 2
complement-2.actionDescription: Add heaven bead (5), then remove 2 earth beads

tooltip.explanation: To add 3, think: 3 = 5 - 2, so add 5 and take away 2

multiStepInstructions: Click the heaven bead to add 5
Click the first earth bead to remove it
Click the second earth bead to remove it

complex-1.title: Complex: 6 + 2
complex-1.description: Add 2 more to 6 (which has heaven + 1 earth)

tooltip.explanation: When you have space in the earth section, just add directly

complex-2.title: Complex: 7 + 4
complex-2.description: Add 4 to 7, but no room for 4 earth beads. Use complement again
complex-2.actionDescription: Add tens heaven, then clear ones place: remove heaven + 2 earth

tooltip.explanation: 7 + 4 = 11, which needs the tens column heaven bead

multiStepInstructions: Click the heaven bead in the tens column (left)
Click the heaven bead in the ones column to remove it
Click the first earth bead to remove it
Click the second earth bead to remove it
